0.question: 24 second graders are learning to play the recorder. 11 second graders are learning to play the flute. How many more students are learning the recorder?

1.question: Mrs. Chin baked 58 cookies for her son's class. She baked 35 chocolate chip cookies. She also baked some oatmeal cookies. How many oatmeal cookies did she bake?

2.question: Derrick and Matt made paper planes after school. Matt made 24 planes. Derrick made 11 more than Matt. How many planes did Derrick make?

3.question: Malcolm's Farm has two kinds of fruit trees. They have 47 apple trees. The have 41 pear trees. How many fruit trees do they have in all?

4.question: My sister and I made snow balls after the big storm. I made 25 snowballs. My sister made 13 more snowballs than me. How many snowballs did my sister make?
